long_description: Find more than 60 bike trails throughout Wisconsin--sometimes it's okay just to enjoy the ride! Created by Mike Hoven and designed by Mary C. Rumpsa. Softcover; 159 pages; illustrated/color maps by American Bike Trails. American Bike Trails; copyright 2005. Easy to reference and use, the guide includes: directions to trail sites and accesses. Trail distances, general setting, conditions and facilities, riding tips. Points of interest, state and sectional overviews, selective community street insets. Contacts for additional information. Mountain biking alternatives.
short_description: Find more than 60 bike trails throughout Wisconsin--sometimes it's okay just to enjoy the ride!
